cab.content: Paraphrase Telegram from the Governor General of tho Commonwealth of Australia to the Secretary of State for the Colonies.(Received Colonial Office 10,15 aym. 24th September1919) iSecret/ Cabled news give prominence to reduction of British Navies and as a result there is an impression that British sea power is ho longer of paramount importance, This impression is reacting cn naval policy in Australia and may stultify work of naval mission. I am aware that circumstances preclude public statement but suggest confidential communication from you indicating intention tc retain naval supremacy and extent cf British naval programme,FERGUSON.
